about_the_company: Salas O'Brien is an employee-owned engineering and professional services firm focused on achieving impact for clients, team members, and the world. Founded in 1975, the company provides integrated engineering and consulting services across various industries, including data centers, healthcare, science and technology, and more.
job_responsibilities: Work with engineer mentors in the design team and take ownership of portions of various projects
Coordinate with other engineering disciplines to develop complete design packages
Acquire time management, communication, and CAD drafting skills
Apply engineering concepts to real-world challenges
required_education: Currently enrolled in an Electrical Engineering program at a four-year ABET university or college
